response.overview: Hoping to put to rest years of unease concerning a past case, retired criminal investigator Benjamín begins writing a novel based on the unsolved mystery of a newlywed’s rape and murder. With the help of a former colleague, judge Irene, he attempts to make sense of the past.
response.tagline: An unsolved crime. A love story. An unwritten ending.
response.title: The Secret in Their Eyes

cast.name: Héctor La Porta
cast.character: Civil Guard Ministry of Social Welfare

Two Riversides Film and Art Festival
